related_questions.question:
Simple present Tense (Verbal)    1. She _____ her dog everyday 
A.Feed
B.Feeds
C.To feed
D.Feeding

2. I ____ always go to the dentist 
A.are not
B.do not
C.does not
D.did not

3. When do you ____ a shower? 
A.taking
B.take
C.taken
D.took

4. Q: Do you like to sing? A: … 
A.Yes, I likes to sing
B.Yes, I like to sing
C.Yes, I am liking to sing
D.Yes, I liked to sing

5. Tom and I ____ ____ together. 
A.do surfs
B.do surfing
C.don’t surfing
D.don't surf

6. I ___ breakfast every day at 7 AM 
A.to eat
B.eat
C.eaten
D.ate

7. Q: How do you go to school? A: We ___ the bus to school 
A.riding
B.ridden
C.ride
D.rode

8. Q: When do you do your homework? A: … 
A.I did my homework at 6 PM
B.I am doing my homework at 6 PM
C.I do my homework at 6 PM
D.I have did my homework at 6 PM

9. Q: Do you enjoy playing in the park? A: … 
A.No, I don’t enjoys playing in the park
B.No, I doesn’t enjoy playing in the park
C.No, I don’t enjoy playing in the park
D.No, I no enjoy playing in the park

10. Q: Does he love his mother? A: … 
A.He love his mother
B.He to love his mother
C.He is loving his mother
D.He loves his mother​

answers.answer:
1. feeds

2. do not

3.take

4. yes, i like to sing

5. do surfing

6. i eat

7.ride

8.C.I do my homework at 6 PM

9.C.No, I don’t enjoy playing in the park

10.D.He loves his mother

Penjelasan:

simple present tense.

yang artinya masa sekarang. dalam tenses ini menggunakan verb satu dan jika subjek she he it nama orang maka verb bertambahan s

related_questions.question: Help me plisssss help help help​

3. Ubah kata yang ada di dalam kurung sehingga menjadi conditional sentence type III yang benar!

“If we (know) about that earlier, we (not come) here.”
_
inappropriate answer will be reported, thank ya ~​

answers.answer:
Conditional Sentence Type 3 adalah suatu kondisi dimana suatu hal sudah tidak memungkinkan lagi untuk terjadi dikarenakan waktu kejadian sudah melampaui batas.

Contohnya : If you had remembered to invite me, I would have attended your party.

Rumus Conditional Sentence Type 3 :

If + Past Perfect + Would + Have + Past Participle.

Perubahan kata diatas menjadi Conditional Sentence Type 3 adalah :

If we had Known about that earlier, We Would'nt Have Come here.

related_questions.question:
The Republic of Indonesia is one of the    Southeast Asian countries. The country is a
highly diverse island archipelago consisting
of around 13,000 islands along the equator
between Asia and Australia. The five
principal islands are Sumatera, Java,
Kalimantan, Sulawesi and Papua (the western
part of New Guinea island). It has a
population of 242 million (2005) that
comprises of about 3,000 ethnic groups.
Indonesia is currently the world's fourth most
populous nation, after China, India and the
US. With a GDP per capita of USD 1420 (USD
3310 in PPP terms), the country is classified
as a lower-middle-income country (World
Bank 2008).​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Negara Kesatuan Republik Indonesia merupakan salah satu

negara-negara Asia Tenggara. Negara adalah

kepulauan yang sangat beragam terdiri dari

dari sekitar 13.000 pulau di sepanjang khatulistiwa

antara Asia dan Australia. lima

pulau utama adalah Sumatera, Jawa,

Kalimantan, Sulawesi dan Papua (bagian barat)

bagian dari pulau New Guinea). Ini memiliki

populasi 242 juta (2005) itu

terdiri dari sekitar 3.000 kelompok etnis.

Indonesia saat ini terbesar keempat di dunia

negara berpenduduk padat, setelah Cina, India, dan

KAMI. Dengan PDB per kapita USD 1420 (USD

3310 dalam istilah PPP), negara diklasifikasikan

sebagai negara berpenghasilan menengah ke bawah (World

Bank 2008).

Penjelasan:

Jangan Lupa Follow ya kak, Dan beri bintang 5 nya

B. akan diberikan keturunan yang banyak
C. akan menyertai mereka senantiasa sampai akahir zaman
D. akan diberikan harta dan kekayaan.​

answers.answer:

Semoga membantu dan semoga benar
